title: Group Leaders "shared" ticket count matches the number of tickets in the shared tickets tab
custom_steps:
Given I log in as a verified patron with some shared tickets
And I am navigated to the Events Page
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I am navigated to the ticket details page
When I click the Shared tickets tab to be hovered over to the Shared Tickets Display
Then the number of shared tickets (Accepted, Pending Acceptance, Error, Invalid email) all combined is equal to the shared count displayed on the Event Tile

title: Group Leaders get a "no tickets" message  if none of their tickets have been shared for the event
custom_steps:
Given I log in as a verified patron with NO shared tickets
And I am navigated to the Events Page
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I am navigated to the ticket details page
When I click the Shared tickets tab to be navigated over to the Shared Tickets Display
Then there will be a message displayed "No tickets have been shared. You can share tickets in Available Tickets"
And "Available Tickets" text in the message is hyperlinked to the available tickets tab
And the Team's logo is displayed below the message
And the Manage List button is disabled
And the Event Tile does not display a shared count

title: Group Leaders are able to see all the buttons (active and inactive) in the Shared Tickets tab
custom_steps:
Given I log in as a verified patron with shared tickets
And I am navigated to the Events Page
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I am navigated to the ticket details page
When I click the Shared tickets tab to be navigated over to the Shared Tickets Display
Then a Refresh button is located below the Event Tile, to the left of the search button
And a Search button located below the Event Tile, to the right of the Refresh button
And a menu on the right hand side of the page containing the add Multiple People Button, Add Person Button, Share Tickets button
And a Recall button or Fix button next to each seat/ticket in the Shared Tickets Tab

* Manage List Button is disabled if there are no active tickets to bulk recall
* Add Multiple People Button and Add Person Button are disabled if there are no more tickets to allocate in the Available Tickets Tab
* Share Tickets Button is disabled if there are no more tickets to share from the Available Tickets tab

title: Group Leaders can view how many ticket that have in each Status in the shared Tickets Tab
custom_steps:
Given I log in as a verified patron with shared tickets in every status (Error, Invalid Email, Pending Acceptance, and Accepted)
And I am navigated to the Events Page
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I am navigated to the ticket details page
When I click the Shared tickets tab to be navigated over to the Shared Tickets Display
Then there is a count next to each of the status title indication the number of tickets in that status.

title: Group Leaders can not allocate nor share tickets if they have shared all thier tickets
custom_steps:
Given I log in as a verified patron with an event with all tickets shared
And I am navigated to the Events Page
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I am navigated to the ticket details page for that event
When I click the Share tickets tab
Then the Add People button will be disabled
And the Add Multiple People Button with be ordering
And the Share Tickets button will be disabled
